subject: Fashion
title: Burberry's Beige Identity
description: A micro-lesson that makes Burberry's Beige Identity usable.

hook.text: Burberry's check pattern was hijacked by hooligans and nearly destroyed the brand.

buildup.text: The beige-red-black check was a symbol of British elegance for a century.

discovery.text: In the 2000s it became associated with football hooligans and counterfeits.

twist.text: Burberry hid the check for years, reinventing itself through minimal design.

climax.text: By 2018 the check returnedâ€”reclaimed and recontextualized as cool again.

punchline.text: A pattern lost its meaning, then earned it back.

quiz.question: What crisis did Burberry's iconic check face in the 2000s?
options: The pattern was copied by a rival brand
It became associated with hooligans and counterfeits
The dyes were found to be toxic
